name: GetItSMS WhatsApp APIs
description:
Send And Receive WhatsApp Bulk Messages(WhatsApp Marketing Messages) Through Whatsapp Business API Gateway(WhatsApp Green Tick Verification). For the Purpose Of Sending Notifications, OTPs, Or Anything Else Using Our WhatsApp Business API (WhatsApp Official API) Or WhatsApp OTP API and WhatsApp Chatbot. For Demo Contact Us(+91-7976724242) Or Register Here - http://sms.getitsms.com/signup 

Shopify Integration - https://apps.shopify.com/wpplugins

api_methods.name: GetIT SMS WHATSAPP API
api_methods.description: We are providing bulk whatsapp sms services.To use our whatsapp bulk sms  service you need api key.Go through our application and get our service.

utterances.utterance: Can you send a WhatsApp message to 919876543210 with the text 'Your order #12345 has been shipped and will arrive by Friday'?

parameters.your_message: Your order #12345 has been shipped and will arrive by Friday

utterances.utterance: Please notify 919876543210 that their appointment with Dr. Smith is confirmed for 10 AM tomorrow.

parameters.your_message: Your appointment with Dr. Smith is confirmed for 10 AM tomorrow

utterances.utterance: Send a WhatsApp message to 919876543210 reminding them to pay their electricity bill by the 15th of this month.

parameters.your_message: Reminder: Please pay your electricity bill by the 15th of this month

utterances.utterance: Could you inform 919876543210 that their gym membership renewal is due next week?

parameters.your_message: Your gym membership renewal is due next week

utterances.utterance: Let 919876543210 know that their flight to New York is scheduled for 8 AM on the 20th.

parameters.your_message: Your flight to New York is scheduled for 8 AM on the 20th

utterances.utterance: Send a message to 919876543210 with the OTP 6789 for their account verification.

parameters.your_message: Your OTP for account verification is 6789

utterances.utterance: Notify 919876543210 that their car service appointment is set for 9 AM this Saturday.

parameters.your_message: Your car service appointment is set for 9 AM this Saturday

utterances.utterance: Can you remind 919876543210 to submit their project report by the end of today?

parameters.your_message: Reminder: Please submit your project report by the end of today

utterances.utterance: Inform 919876543210 that their online course starts at 2 PM tomorrow.

parameters.your_message: Your online course starts at 2 PM tomorrow

utterances.utterance: Send a WhatsApp message to 919876543210 with the details of their upcoming meeting at 3 PM in Conference Room B.

parameters.your_message: Your upcoming meeting is at 3 PM in Conference Room B
